meanings.sent1: She was paganising the ancient artifacts by placing them on the altar.

meanings.definition: To practice pagan rituals or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The villagers were paganising under the full moon.
meanings.sent2: She felt a deep connection to nature while paganising in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The children were paganising in the backyard, pretending to cast spells.

meanings.sent5: The flickering candles were paganising the room with an eerie glow.
